'''1.3.4''' is a minor update to the [[launcher]] released on November 26, 2013.

== Changes ==
* Faster downloading of some big files.

== Fixes ==
* [[bugtracker:MCL-1764|MCL-1764]] – "Play Offline" tries to download files with proxy connection active
